content.html: We literally live in a society in which many are saying (either verbally or through their actions) "I don't care if vulnerable people die so long as I get to live my life". And yet people get offended when the term "eugenics" is used by those very disabled people?!
content.value:
We literally live in a society in which many are saying (either verbally or through their actions) "I don't care if vulnerable people die so long as I get to live my life".

And yet people get offended when the term "eugenics" is used by those very disabled people?!
